alert.note: Alert for Mineral; Missoula (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:59PM MDT until August 29 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Mineral County in west central Montana... Southwestern Missoula County in west central Montana... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 359 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tarkio to 13 miles west of Florence, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alberton, Tarkio, Wye, Riverbend, Ninemile, Lozeau, Huson, Quartz, Cyr, and Stark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
